analysis.key_quote: Such a policy would irrevocably slow our progress to improve the lives of Americans and undermine the reputation of the US as the leader in scientific research in ways that will have far-reaching consequences to our economy and to the opportunities of future generations.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization and the importance of merit-based selection in scientific positions, indicating a clear stance against the rule.
